name: Stitch Wars
description:
To be honest I just really wanted to make a tactics game...

I always like bending the wording of Ludum Dare themes out of shape on purpose: here "button control" refers not to how the game is controlled (although it does only use the two mouse buttons) but rather to the button-eyes and button-shields of the stitch-punk universe.

The game is pretty simple, but there are a few tricky rules:

  • Left click to select a stitch-punk.
  • Right-click to issue an order.
  • All attacks happen before charges.
  • All charges happen before retreats.
  • All retreats happen before all moves.
  • stitch-punks take double damage if surrounded.
  • stitch-punks take half damage if they have the high ground.

You can vote for the game here.
